description: Retrieves details for a specific user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user to get data for.

nested_items.name: userId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the user that is retrieved.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the user.
CREATING --- The creation is in progress.
ENABLED --- The user is created and is currently active.
DISABLED --- The user is currently inactive.

nested_items.name: firstName
nested_items.description: The first name of the user.

nested_items.name: lastName
nested_items.description: The last name of the user.

nested_items.name: emailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address that is associated with the user.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Indicates the type of user.
SUPER_USER --- A user with permission to all the functionality and data in FinSpace.
APP_USER --- A user with specific permissions in FinSpace. The users are assigned permissions by adding them to a permission group.

nested_items.name: apiAccess
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the user can use the GetProgrammaticAccessCredentials API to obtain credentials that can then be used to access other FinSpace Data API operations.
ENABLED --- The user has permissions to use the APIs.
DISABLED --- The user does not have permissions to use any APIs.

nested_items.name: apiAccessPrincipalArn
nested_items.description: The ARN identifier of an AWS user or role that is allowed to call the GetProgrammaticAccessCredentials API to obtain a credentials token for a specific FinSpace user. This must be an IAM role within your FinSpace account.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the user was created in FinSpace. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: lastEnabledTime
nested_items.description: Describes the last time the user was activated. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: lastDisabledTime
nested_items.description: Describes the last time the user was deactivated. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: Describes the last time the user details were updated. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: lastLoginTime
nested_items.description: Describes the last time that the user logged into their account. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds.
